dialogue.introduction: I'm Hatsukaze, nice to meet you. Admiral, how many of me did you have before me, I wonder?
dialogue.library_intro: Kagerou-class destroyer, Hatsukaze. Myoukou-neesan and I crashed into each other off Bougainville, and my bow got torn off... Crippled and unable to move, I was the target of concentrated fire and then... I'm scared....I'm so scared, Myoukou-neesan...
dialogue.secretary1: Ah... Admiral, thanks for the hard work.
dialogue.secretary2: Staaaare~ I'm just looking. Is that bad?
dialogue.secretary3: Hey! Just what are you touching! I'm going to hit you and fight you! Do you want me to tell Myoukou-neesan?!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Ah, geez, I'm so bored~! Admiral, do something~
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, just where are you looking? Hatsukaze's right here.
dialogue.wedding: Why're you calling me over here? I'm busy with maintenance and replenishment… eh? What? Such a large bouquet… for me? No way... I'm so happy… I'm...wha..what are you making me say, you stupid Admiral!? I-I'll just keep it!
dialogue.show_players_score: This, is a letter for the commander? hmm?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'm going to the bath. No peeking!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet returned home from battle.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Off I go! I'll leave behind these annoyances!
dialogue.battle_start: I'll say it straight...Myoukou-oneesan is scarier to me.
dialogue.night_attack: Why are you coming over here!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Why are you coming over here!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Why are you coming over here!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Why are you coming over here!
dialogue.mvp: This battle that was led by Hatsukaze to victory, don't forget it now.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: No, D-direct hit on the bow? I've already been hit there by Myoukou-oneesan once...it's been weakened...Aah...I'm scared...
dialogue.sunk: I wanted Admiral to be so much more stronger so... I kept saying harsh things to him... sorry...
dialogue.white_day_2015: What? Is this for me?... But aren't you going to give these to many others?... Um, I'll accept it anyways.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Today is special. I'm happy to spend this time with you
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Haahh....it'll be summer soon.... Eh, a swimsuit? I didn't buy one. What's that? You want to give me a present?
dialogue.midsummer_2015: It's finally summer's time. What? Go for a swim? Sure. Ah, we're inviting Shiranui too? Ah, I see.
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn, huh? I don't like the nights during this season. Uhm, no special reason for that but...
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas... what's with that look on your face? It's Christmas! It should be fun, right?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year. Admiral, at least do it right this new year. See. you can do it after all.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun, huh... Ah, Myoukou-neesan. Eh? You're the demon? No, rather, let me be it instead!

hourly.0000: Midnight, huh. How about some sleep?
hourly.0100: It's 1 A.M. It's really night-time, eh?
hourly.0200: 2 A.M... huh. Not going to sleep soon?
hourly.0400: 4 o'clock. If you don't go to bed soon then...
hourly.0600: It's 6 o'clock. Admiral... all nighter? Perhaps?
hourly.0700: It's 7 A.M. Admiral, let's have breakfast.
hourly.0800: 8 o'clock. Looks like today's weather will be good as well.
hourly.0900: It's 9 o'clock. Shall we go all out soon?♪
hourly.1000: 10 o'clock! Somehow... I'm not really feeling it~
hourly.1100: It's 11 o'clock. It'll soon be midday, yeah?
hourly.1200: Midday. What are you doing for lunch? I want to eat something tasty~
hourly.1300: 1 P.M. Why don't you take a nap?
hourly.1400: It's 2 P.M~. I'm a bit sleepy at this time.
hourly.1500: 3 P.M. I want to eat something sweet~
hourly.1800: It's now 6 P.M. What's for dinner~?
hourly.1900: 7 P.M. Admiral, let's eat dinner. I'm starving~
hourly.2100: It's 9 P.M. Almost time for night battles, yeah?
hourly.2200: 10 P.M. Sendai-neesan isn't here, it's nice and quiet.
hourly.2300: The time is now, 11 P.M. Going to take a break soon?
